definitions.definition: A demon said to feed on corpses .
A person with an undue interest in death and corpses, or more generally in things that are revolting and repulsive .
A person with a callous or uncaring attitude to human life and suffering, particularly when prioritizing economic concerns.

main_definition: ( mythology ) A demon said to feed on corpses .
secondary_definitions: A person with an undue interest in death and corpses, or more generally in things that are revolting and repulsive .
( derogatory , colloquial ) A person with a callous or uncaring attitude to human life and suffering, particularly when prioritizing economic concerns.
